burgers.name: Slam Burger
Ingredients: 100% Beef, American Cheese, Lettuce, Tomatoes, Slam Sauce, Mustard, Mayo
burgers.Description: Our Slam Burger's super power is it's Slam Sauce that'll knock your socks off!

burgers.name: AMW Burger
Ingredients: 100% Beef, American Cheese, Cheddar Cheese, Street Beef BBQ
burgers.Description: Our AMW Burger's is addictive, be careful!

burgers.name: Burger Rush
Ingredients: 100% Beef, American Cheese, Street Beef BBQ, Slam Sauce, Pickles, Onions
burgers.Description: Our Burger Rush is so full of flavor that each bite just melts in your mouth.

burgers.name: Brooklyn Burger
Ingredients: Pepper Jack Cheese, Applewood Bacon, Pickled Onions, Banana Peppers
burgers.Description: Take a blast to the streets of Brooklyn with our Brooklyn Burger

burgers.name: Englewood Burger
Ingredients: Three-Year Aged White cheddar, Hickory Smoked Bacon, Char-Grilled Onions + Bacon Brioche
burgers.Description: Take a blast to the streets of Chicago with our Englewood Burger

burgers.name: LA Burger
Ingredients: 100% all Beef Quarter Pound Patty Served on a Fresh Bun with Original Tommy's Famous Chili, Hand Sliced Beefsteak Tomato, Mustard, Pickles, and Fresh Chopped Onions.
burgers.Description: Take a blast to the streets of Los Angeles with our LA Burger

burgers.name: Impossible
Ingredients: Made entirely from PLANTS. Cholesterol free, 17 grams of protein and 35% less fat than ground beef. Topped with grilled onions, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and sweet red onion.
burgers.Description: It's not real meat, it's a plant!

burgers.name: Beyond
Ingredients: Plant-Based Patty with 20 grams of plant protein per serving, refined coconut oil, canola oil, rice protein
burgers.Description: It's not real meat, it's a plant!

burgers.name: Purgrass
Ingredients: 100% Grass Fed Beef Burger, No Antibiotics, no hormones and no steroids, ever, Pasture fed and humanely raised
burgers.Description: It's not real meat, it's a plant!
